text: Researchers at Stanford University have developed a new algorithm that improves early detection of Alzheimer's disease. The study, published in the Journal of Medical AI, shows a 40% improvement in early diagnosis compared to current methods. The team analyzed brain scans from over 5,000 patients using machine learning techniques.
